hotels.title: Modern Taiwan Retreat in the Heart of Kaohsiung Downtown District
hotels.description: Escape to the peaceful country of Taiwan, famous for its generosity and kindness with a modern stay at Hotel Indigo Kaohsiung Central Park, an IHG Hotel - overlooking the lush city park. Explore the majestic temples and learn the country’s history with local tours and visits to the museums, before returning to refuel at Wok on the Park restaurant , or enjoying a refreshing drink at Pier No. 1 rooftop bar.

hotels.title: Beautiful Taiwanese Escape on the Banks of Local Harbour with Five Onsite Restaurants
hotels.description: Escape to the beautiful city of Kaohsiung, home to Taiwan’s largest port, and stay at the lavish InterContinental Kaohsiung, an IHG Hotel. The hotel is perfectly positioned to overlook the tranquil Kaohsiung Harbour and is the ideal location to explore the exciting city below. Soak in the Taiwanese atmosphere, meet the locals then return to relax in the gorgeous indoor pool and enjoy a meal in one of the five onsite restaurants, all offering a variety of dining experiences to suit any appetite.
